originalText.text: Melissa did an amazing job organizing and redesigning my son's room. He was 5 at the time and we wanted to fully transition to a "big boy" room that he could grow into and also provide more storage/functional space. She helped design a wall unit with storage and a desk and helped us choose new furniture and art. She also re-organized his belongings. He LOVES his room. She understood the style we were hoping to achieve and found budget-friendly items. She is easy to work with - highly recommend.

originalText.text: All I can say is that Melissa is the organizing whisper. A week after having my daughter, I was overwhelmed with being a new mother, and did not have the mental or physical strength to start readying my house for my new life with baby. I called Melissa for help. She quickly was able to assess my needs, identify areas in the house to transform (i.e. my husband’s standing desk station became our downstairs baby changing station), and got to work to make a new environment for the baby. The end product was amazing – she transformed my house and I had an organized layout on both floors for our newborn needs. I am deeply indebted to her for this help at a critical time in my life and can’t say enough positive about Melissa’s organizing ability, vision, and execution.

originalText.text:
We contracted with Melissa to reimagine our daughters bedroom and to make our master bathroom more functional.  Our 11 year old daughter despised her bedroom before the redesign; she now spends much of her free time there. Melissa’s organization skills have made our master bathroom more functional and less cluttered.

I can’t say enough about Melissa’s design acumen. I would highly recommend her services

originalText.text: Melissa came to our home and created organized spaces I did not even know was possible.  She offered practical suggestions that I am still implementing today.  Most importantly her systems were easily maintainable, creating zen like spaces that I continue to enjoy today!
